plot: After her boyfriend breaks her heart a bathhouse prostitute recalls the good time she had with a businessman customer from her hometown, and returns there to find him.
title: Sex Man'yôshû: shabon-dama densetsu
plot_es: After her boyfriend breaks her heart a bathhouse prostitute recalls the good time she had with a businessman customer from her hometown, and returns there to find him.
plot_en: After her boyfriend breaks her heart a bathhouse prostitute recalls the good time she had with a businessman customer from her hometown, and returns there to find him.
